texto: acceptance criteria for a completed software product. NOTE 1 This part of ISO/IEC 9126 can be used in conjunction with ISO/IEC 15504 (which is concerned with the software process assessment) to provide: • a framework for software product quality definition in the customer-supplier process; © ISO/IEC 2001 – All rights reserved 1 ISO/IEC 9126-1:2001(E) • support for review, verification and validation, and a framework for quantitative quality evaluation, in the support process; • support for setting organisational quality goals in the management process.
